price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Medeε mennim sε deε yɛahyε mo ho bͻ no abεn, anaasε me Wura Nyankopͻn de bεhyε εberε tenten bi.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tūʿadūna am yajʿalu lahu rabbī amadan
